ABOUT_PAGE.TITLE: About
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_1: I am a Full Stack Software Engineer with over 15 years of experience in software development. My career is marked by the combination of technical skills, a strategic approach to design, and a deep understanding of business, allowing me to create high-performance and impactful technological solutions.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_2: In 2012, I co-founded IVEStudio (Inside the Visual Experiences), where I served as a creative director, designer, and frontend developer. One of the company's most relevant products was the development of a mobile and web platform that connected passengers to taxi drivers, providing administrative and financial management for cooperatives, competing with companies such as Taxibeat and EasyTaxi in Rio de Janeiro.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_3: In 2018, I co-founded Bitbeer, a SaaS platform focused on the craft beer market. I was involved in all stages of development, leading the creation of a mobile application for customers and store owners, developed with Ionic and Angular, as well as an administrative panel for order and operations management, built using Angular, C# .NET Core, ElasticSearch, and PostgreSQL. The platform was designed to be functional and scalable, incorporating advanced features such as a detailed product catalog that correlated with each user profileâ€™s preferences, integration with delivery services, a discount coupon system, and a payment module.
ABOUT_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_4: Between 2021 and 2024, I refined my skills in modern technologies and developed strong autonomy in project management. I have an innate ability to learn and am constantly improving, aiming to create solutions that positively impact businesses and people.

SKILLS_PAGE.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_1: Throughout my career, I have developed expertise in various programming languages, frameworks, libraries, and tools that allow me to build modern and efficient solutions. Whether in frontend, backend, or mobile development, I am always focused on using best practices and technologies to deliver high-quality and impactful products.

EXPERIENCES_PAGE.TITLE: Experiences
EXPERIENCES_PAGE.PARAGRAPH_1: My professional journey is defined by diverse experiences that span software development, design, and technical leadership. In each opportunity, I contributed with innovative solutions, tackled unique challenges, and learned new technologies. These experiences have shaped my career and strengthened my passion for creating impact through my work.
